conferences.title: NextJS
conferences.description: Next.js Conf is an investment in your project, your company, and even your career. Be ready to learn how developers are iterating faster and more efficiently than ever before.         Vercel (creators of Next.js) and the Next.js Community will present the latest on creating high-performing sites and apps in the moment of inspiration. Invite your friends and colleagues to this online experience that developers love.
